response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance the efficiency and profitability of your business operations. Given its unique features and capabilities, I estimate its true value to be well above $1,200,000. However, to facilitate a transaction and consider your specific needs, I am offering this exceptional asset to you at an exclusive price of $1,500,000. This offer includes comprehensive support and customization options to ensure seamless integration into your existing systems.

Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if there's any way I can provide additional information to help you make an informed decision. I look forward to the possibility of working with you and contributing to the growth of your business.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1500000}
